title: Nobody's victim
creator_credit: Ramsgate Films, Self-protection Media for Women, Alan Barker and Vaughn Ohern
brief_description: Based on the book ‘Personal safety and self-defence for women’ by Pat F. Stock. Covers property and life saving precautions, and shows simple defence methods that every woman can use.
